Texto: 
stool (+) for blood, exam otherwise wnl
surgical resection
single contrast barium enema demonstrates a 3 cm "apple core" annular constricting lesion at the hepatic flexure of the colon.
colon cancer
• benign strictures resulting from diverticulitis
• annular carcinoma
• lymphoma
72 year old man with a history of painless bleeding per rectum
